Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
There are several sustainable or environmental practices that have been implemented by various entities mentioned in the text. These include:

1. Insulation of buildings and switch to electric vehicles (Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions).
2. Purchasing green energy (Scope 2 emissions).
3. Using electric vehicles and bikes for deliveries (Scope 3 emissions).
4. Implementing carbon neutral deliveries (Scope 3 emissions).
5. Reducing air pollution and achieving significant emission reduction savings (Scope 3 emissions).
6. Aggregating 7% zero-emission drivers and riders (Scope 3 emissions).
7. Offering logistics consultancy sessions to examine the environmental impact of businesses (supply chain decarbonization).
8. Tracking all deliveries using a sustainability reporting system.

2. COP 26 Conference in Glasgow - XeroE joined hands with other technology companies to attend the COP 26 conference in Glasgow. Together, these companies aimed to accelerate progress towards net zero emissions and encourage tech companies to develop climate action plans and utilize technology to assist their customers in living more sustainably.
3. Partnerships with Bethnal Green Ventures and B Labs - XeroE has formed strategic partnerships with Bethnal Green Ventures and B Labs to collaborate on innovative projects and initiatives. Through these partnerships, XeroE contributes to the growth and development of the B Corp community while benefiting from shared knowledge, resources, and expertise.
